AddGearBlack_6B13.Name: 6B13 assault armor (Black)
AddGearBlack_6B13.Description: The main armored vest for personnel of combat units of the ground forces, airborne troops, marines, etc. The vest is designed to protect vital organs from being hit by firearms, shell fragments, mines, grenades, and cold weapons, reducing the severity of armor contusion injury when performing combat missions. Black color version.

AddGearBlack_6B13M_Killa.Name: 6B13 M modified assault armor (Killa, Black)
AddGearBlack_6B13M_Killa.Description: A 6B13 armored vest that has had its ceramic armored plates replaced with lightweight polyethylene plates. The protection class is higher and the weight is lower. This particular set of armor has been personally modified by Killa.

AddGearBlack_6B23_1.Name: 6B23-1 body armor (Black)
AddGearBlack_6B23_1.Description: The "Zabralo-8" main armored vest for personnel of combat units of the ground forces, airborne troops, marines, etc. The vest is designed to protect vital organs from being hit by firearms, shell fragments, mines, grenades, and cold weapons, reducing the severity of armor contusion injury when performing combat missions.

AddGearBlack_6B23_2.Name: 6B23-2 body armor (Black)
AddGearBlack_6B23_2.Description: The "Zabralo-8" main armored vest for personnel of combat units of the ground forces, airborne troops, marines, etc. The vest is designed to protect vital organs from being hit by firearms, shell fragments, mines, grenades, and cold weapons, reducing the severity of armor contusion injury when performing combat missions.

AddGearBlack_Defender2.Name: FORT Defender-2 body armor (Black)
AddGearBlack_Defender2.Description: The FORT OK "Defender-2" operational kit is a modification of the popular body armor FORT "Defender" designed for both VIP and for employees of operational combat units. The kit uses the maximum capabilities of the modular principle of building armor based on steel plates.

AddGearBlack_Defender2_Light.Name: FORT Defender-2 body armor (Light, Black)
AddGearBlack_Defender2_Light.Description: The FORT OK "Defender-2" operational kit is a modification of the popular body armor FORT "Defender" designed for both VIP and for employees of operational combat units. The kit uses the maximum capabilities of the modular principle of building armor based on steel plates.

AddGearBlack_GEN4_Full.Name: IOTV Gen4 body armor (full protection, Black)
AddGearBlack_GEN4_Full.Description: The Improved Outer Tactical Vest (IOTV) Gen IV is designed to permit maximum freedom of movement required to assume correct firing positions with the agility to execute and maneuver tasks. Optimal design characteristics ensure the best possible weight distribution of both the ballistic body armor system as well as additional load bearing equipment, thus providing enhanced comfort, wear duration, and mobility. Full protection kit.

AddGearBlack_GEN4_Assault.Name: IOTV Gen4 body armor (assault kit, Black)
AddGearBlack_GEN4_Assault.Description: The Improved Outer Tactical Vest (IOTV) Gen IV is designed to permit maximum freedom of movement required to assume correct firing positions with the agility to execute and maneuver tasks. Optimal design characteristics ensure the best possible weight distribution of both the ballistic body armor system as well as additional load bearing equipment, thus providing enhanced comfort, wear duration, and mobility. Increased ergonomics assault kit.

AddGearBlack_GEN4_Mobility.Name: IOTV Gen4 body armor (high mobility kit, Black)
AddGearBlack_GEN4_Mobility.Description: The Improved Outer Tactical Vest (IOTV) Gen IV is designed to permit maximum freedom of movement required to assume correct firing positions with the agility to execute and maneuver tasks. Optimal design characteristics ensure the best possible weight distribution of both the ballistic body armor system as well as additional load bearing equipment, thus providing enhanced comfort, wear duration, and mobility. Increased mobility and comfort kit.

AddGearBlack_GEN4_Light.Name: IOTV Gen4 body armor (light kit, Black)
AddGearBlack_GEN4_Light.Description: The Improved Outer Tactical Vest (IOTV) Gen IV is designed to permit maximum freedom of movement required to assume correct firing positions with the agility to execute and maneuver tasks. Optimal design characteristics ensure the best possible weight distribution of both the ballistic body armor system as well as additional load bearing equipment, thus providing enhanced comfort, wear duration, and mobility. Light kit.

AddGearBlack_Gzhel.Name: BNTI Gzhel-K body armor (Black)
AddGearBlack_Gzhel.Description: The Gzhel assault bulletproof vest is designed for assault units of the Ministry of Internal Affairs and other law enforcement agencies. A special variant of Gzhel-K armor is equipped with ceramic armored panels based on corundum (Russian GOST class 5 protection).

AddGearBlack_Redut_Full.Name: FORT Redut-T5 body armor (Black)
AddGearBlack_Redut_Full.Description: The FORT "Redut T5" armor vest is a reinforced version of Redut armor series, designed with account of the many years of experience in counter-terrorism operations in the Russian Federation.

AddGearBlack_Redut_Assault.Name: FORT Redut-M body armor (Assault, Black)
AddGearBlack_Redut_Assault.Description: "Redut-M" is a modified version of the well-proven Redut body armor, which is in service of special units of the FSB. The vest is based on advanced technologies in the field of individual armor. Due to the optimized form of armor elements and the outer cover with a special damping-ventilation system, the Redut M armored vest has excellent functional qualities, which facilitates active actions, including those associated with the use of vehicles and in confined spaces. Assault kit.

AddGearBlack_Redut_Mobility.Name: FORT Redut-M body armor (Mobility, Black)
AddGearBlack_Redut_Mobility.Description: "Redut-M" is a modified version of the well-proven Redut body armor, which is in service of special units of the FSB. The vest is based on advanced technologies in the field of individual armor. Due to the optimized form of armor elements and the outer cover with a special damping-ventilation system, the Redut M armored vest has excellent functional qualities, which facilitates active actions, including those associated with the use of vehicles and in confined spaces.

AddGearBlack_Redut_Light.Name: FORT Redut-M body armor (Light, Black)
AddGearBlack_Redut_Light.Description: "Redut-M" is a modified version of the well-proven Redut body armor, which is in service of special units of the FSB. The vest is based on advanced technologies in the field of individual armor. Due to the optimized form of armor elements and the outer cover with a special damping-ventilation system, the Redut M armored vest has excellent functional qualities, which facilitates active actions, including those associated with the use of vehicles and in confined spaces. Base kit with no additional protection.

AddGearBlack_Thor_ICBA_Full.Name: NFM THOR Integrated Carrier body armor (full protection, Black)
AddGearBlack_Thor_ICBA_Full.Description: The THOR full protection assault body armor equipped with soft and hard armor elements to protect against shrapnel and bullets of pistol and rifle calibers. Manufactured by NFM.

AddGearBlack_THOR_ICBA_Assault.Name: NFM THOR Integrated Carrier body armor (assault kit, Black)
AddGearBlack_THOR_ICBA_Assault.Description: The THOR full protection assault body armor equipped with soft and hard armor elements to protect against shrapnel and bullets of pistol and rifle calibers. Manufactured by NFM. Increased ergonomics assault kit.

AddGearBlack_THOR_ICBA_Mobility.Name: NFM THOR Integrated Carrier body armor (high mobility kit, Black)
AddGearBlack_THOR_ICBA_Mobility.Description: The THOR full protection assault body armor equipped with soft and hard armor elements to protect against shrapnel and bullets of pistol and rifle calibers. Manufactured by NFM. Increased mobility and comfort kit.

AddGearBlack_THOR_ICBA_Light.Name: NFM THOR Integrated Carrier body armor (light kit, Black)
AddGearBlack_THOR_ICBA_Light.Description: The THOR full protection assault body armor equipped with soft and hard armor elements to protect against shrapnel and bullets of pistol and rifle calibers. Manufactured by NFM. Barebones kit with no extra protection.

AddGearBlack_Trooper_USEC.Name: HighCom Trooper TFO body armor (USEC, Black)
AddGearBlack_Trooper_USEC.Description: A plate armor vest by HighCom, popular among USEC PMCs. The lightweight AR500 class 4 (Russian GOST) protection plates cover only the chest and back areas. Black version.

AddGearBlack_Trooper.Name: HighCom Trooper TFO body armor (Black)
AddGearBlack_Trooper.Description: A plate armor vest by HighCom. The lightweight AR500 class 4 (Russian GOST) protection plates cover only the chest and back areas. Black version.

AddGearBlack_UntarVest.Name: Light Military Flak Vest (Black)
AddGearBlack_UntarVest.Description: A class III body armor used by PMCs and security forces all around the world.
